mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gifticon_exchange ( MEMBER_CODE, GIFTICON_EXCODE, GIFTICON_CODE, GIFTICON_NUMBER, GIFTICON_EXDATE ) VALUES ( #{memberCode}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(GIFTICON_EXCODE)),0)+1 FROM GIFTICON_EXCHANGE WHERE MEMBER_CODE= #{memberCode}), #{gifticonCode}, #{gifticonNumber}, SYSDATE )
